name: nativescript-circle-menu
description: CircleMenu is a simple, elegant menu with a circular layout. http://ramotion.com.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-circle-menu && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
